00028 #include "OgreController.h"
00029 
00030 #include "OgreLogManager.h"
00031 
00032 namespace Ogre
00033 {
00034     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     Controller::Controller(ControllerValue* src, ControllerValue* dest, ControllerFunction* func)
00036     {
00037         mFunc = func;
00038         mSource = src;
00039         mDest = dest;
00040     }
00041     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042     Controller::~Controller()
00043     {
00044     }
00045     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00046     void Controller::setSource(ControllerValue* src)
00047     {
00048         mSource = src;
00049     }
00050     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00051     ControllerValue* Controller::getSource(void)
00052     {
00053         return mSource;
00054     }
00055     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00056     void Controller::setDestination(ControllerValue* dest)
00057     {
00058         mDest = dest;
00059     }
00060     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00061     ControllerValue* Controller::getDestination(void)
00062     {
00063         return mDest;
00064     }
00065     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00066     void Controller::setFunction(ControllerFunction* func)
00067     {
00068         mFunc = func;
00069     }
00070     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00071     ControllerFunction* Controller::getFunction(void)
00072     {
00073         return mFunc;
00074     }
00075     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076     void Controller::update(void)
00077     {
00078         mDest->setValue(mFunc->calculate(mSource->getValue()));
00079     }
00080 }
